_comment: Functions is an array of each function definig is allowed roles / users. each roles/users can be writted in Str or ID
the config file must be at the same place of the bot and must be named like the bot exe but with .cfg
ID is prevalent over the rest, if users/roles can't be resolved when guild is loaded then it will be deleted and wont be saved
if no ID is present, users will try to be resolved then ID will be added
